snippet.title: Hellslave - Trailer
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉 https://bit.ly/3Gpi1lm

The world is coming to an end and humanity is on the brink of extinction. Save it from a demon invasion by making a pact with the Devil and praise one of 6 demons to avoid humanity’s demise into darkness. Use your newly acquired demonic power against the invaders but it may have a bigger impact on you than you thought... Hellslave is a dungeon crawler unlike others following on the footpath of classic dungeon crawlers but introducing new mechanics and drawing its inspirations from Dark fantasy universe, poems, and artists (such as John Milton).

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
